#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main(){

    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){

        int n,i;
        cin>>n;
        string s;
        int a[n];

        cin>>s;

        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>a[i];

        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            char c;
            c=s[i];
            s[i]=s[a[i]-1];
            s[a[i]-1]=c;
        }
        cout<<s<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
